source:
# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (horizon tables) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.casework tables)
- **New Data:** where an main Reference in the source does not exist in the target, then NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on Reference Fields in source and in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an Reference info in the target exists but the same identifyers don't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View casework_picaso_dim is created

%%sql
-- Build casework_picaso_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_picaso_dim_new

     AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT 
    CASE
        WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number IS NULL
        THEN T3.PicassoID
        ELSE NULL
    END as PicassoID,
    T1.appeal_reference_number AS AppealRefNumber,
        
    valid_date AS ValidDate,
    received_date AS ReceivedDate,
    event_date AS EventDate,
    start_date AS StartDate,
    decided_date AS DecidedDate,
    first_submission_date AS FirstSubmissionDate,
    last_submission_date AS LastSubmissionDate,
    appeal_end_date AS AppealEndDate,
    procedure_name AS ProcedureName,
    lpa_code AS LpaCode,
    lpa_name AS LpaName,
    appeal_type AS AppealType,
    jurisdiction AS Jurisdiction,
    development_type AS DevelopmentType,
    inspector_staff_number AS InspectorStaffNumber,
    processing_state
    specialism_level_code
    site_postcode_region
    target_source_key
    case_officer_email
    open_processing_stage
    open_valid_to_today_weeks
    open_valid_to_today_target_status
    open_sitting_to_today_weeks
    valid_to_start_weeks
    valid_to_sitting_weeks
    start_to_decision_weeks
    valid_to_decision_weeks
    received_to_decision_weeks
    sitting_to_decision_weeks
    start_to_sitting_weeks
    received_to_valid_weeks
    open_weeks_since_sitting
    sitting_to_first_submission_weeks
    sitting_to_last_submission_weeks
    last_submission_to_decision_weeks
    inspector_personal_target_date
    inspector_personal_target_marker
    date_order_flag
    open_received_to_today_weeks
    received_to_end_weeks
    open_start_to_today_weeks
    open_submit_to_today_weeks
    was_gdt_VtoS_hit
    was_gdt_StoE_hit
    was_gdt_EtoD_hit
    was_gdt_overall_hit
    start_to_last_submission_weeks
    source_system
    received_to_start_weeks
    received_to_event_weeks
    lpa_decision_to_received_weeks
    event_to_submission_target_hit
    development_or_allegation
    apellant
    site_address_line_1
    site_address_postcode
    lpa_application_reference
    redetermined
    has_bespoke_target
    enforcement_linked
    appeal_turned_away_date
    appeal_withdrawn_date
    target_date
    is_kiosk
    in_measure
    was_target_hit
    was_legacy_target_hit
    is_reading_case
    FloorSpaceInSquareMetres
    AppellantProcedure
    AppealsDocumentsComplete
    DecisionCode
    DecisionCodeDesc
    appeal_decided_date
    source_system1
    sitevisittime
    timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundDue
    timeline5_StatementOfCommonGroundPublished
    timeline5_AppellantStatementPublished
    timeline5_AppellantStatementDue
    Ownership_Permission
    event_code
    lpa_application_date
    lpa_decision_date
    ons_codesite_address
    is_virtual_event
    prior_approval
    final_comments_due_date
    appeal_source_indicator


    T2.SourceSystemID,
    CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IngestionDate,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.appeal_reference_number,'.'), IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'), IFNULL(T1.standardpriority,'.'),IFNULL(T1.importantinformation,'.'))) as RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields, so needs to be done
    'Y' as IsActive,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number = T3.AppealRefNumber AND  md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.appeal_reference_number,'.'), IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'), IFNULL(T1.standardpriority,'.'),IFNULL(T1.importantinformation,'.'))) <> T3.RowID   -- same employee, changed data
        THEN 'Y'
        WHEN T3.AppealRefNumber IS NULL -- new AppealRef
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END as NewData,
    CASE
        WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number IS NULL
        THEN 'Y'
        ELSE 'N'
    END AS  DeletedData, 
    T3.IsActive as HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.horizon_additional_fields T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 ON "Casework" = T2.Description AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim T3 ON T1.appeal_reference_number = T3.AppealRefNumber AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    (
        -- flags new data        
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number = T3.AppealRefNumber AND md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.appeal_reference_number,'.'), IFNULL(T1.casereference,'.'), IFNULL(T1.standardpriority,'.'),IFNULL(T1.importantinformation,'.'))) <> T3.RowID  -- same employee, changed data
                THEN 'Y'
                WHEN T3.AppealRefNumber IS NULL -- new PositionCode
                THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
            END  = 'Y' ) OR
        
        -- flags deleted data
        (   CASE
                WHEN T1.appeal_reference_number IS NULL
                THEN 'Y'
                ELSE 'N'
            END = 'Y' )
    );

# Run tests to check integrity of data by numbers
- This script checks for the total number of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the numbers for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tolerance levels:** if the total amount to be added and deleted surpasses the tolerance limit, it will interrupt the process of loading the data

# Run tests to check integrity of data by comparison of codes
- This script checks for the total list of current codes in the harmonised table, and compare against the list for new data to be added and data to be set as inactive.
- **Changes tracking:** where it checks the data against active records in harmonised and compares with records to add and records to be set as inactive.

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **casework_all_appeals_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View casework_picaso_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW casework_picaso_dim_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 
SELECT 
    PicassoID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    StandardPriority,
    ImportantInformation,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive

From casework_picaso_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'
SELECT
    PicassoID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    StandardPriority,
    ImportantInformation,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim
WHERE AppealRefNumber IN (SELECT AppealRefNumber FROM casework_picaso_dim_new WHERE PicassoID IS NULL) AND IsActive = 'Y';

# View casework_picaso_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key (i.e. AllAppealsID), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the surrogate Key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim is updated

%%sql
-- merge into dim table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim AS Target
USING casework_picaso_dim_changed_rows AS Source

ON Source.PicassoID = Target.PicassoID

-- For Updates existing rows

WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = date_sub(current_timestamp,1),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT * ;

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new casework_picaso_dim

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AppealRefNumber NULLS LAST) AS PicassoID,
    AppealRefNumber,
    CaseReference,
    StandardPriority,
    ImportantInformation,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_picaso_dim;
